vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in EtherBank.withdrawBalance (etherbank.sol#12-16):
	External calls:
	- ! (msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (etherbank.sol#14)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userBalances (etherbank.sol#15)

vulnerability_findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected @ etherbank.sol#14:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
